item.description:
South Boston has a thriving art scene!

Be a part of a series of art-inspired networking events. Discuss aesthetic, craft and talent by crawling with fellow artists and architects as part of larger open artist studio events. After visiting local studios, the party will head somewhere nearby for food or drinks. If you can't make the party, you can visit the South Boston Open Studios from November 6 - 7.

Meet outside the Distillery studios (516 E. 2nd St.) at 2:30 pm

For more information contact Rebecca McWilliams at rmcwilliams[at]smma.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the Distillery studios (516 E. 2nd St.) at 2:30 pm
item.name: Architects and Artists Collaborate: South Boston Open Studio Crawl
